stories.text: I just redid the entire UI for my site builder - made it easier to follow, and use.  Less confusing, and more straightforward.  Let me know what you think.  To just see the screenshots I added the new ui to  https://websites4.me/Example.php first 3 images in the gallery.  Let me know what you think.
stories.title: Websites4.me Website Builder

stories.text: I'm considering to buy an orthopedic seat pad, but I have no experience with such a device. Does it really help minimizing the long term negative orthopedic effects of spending long hours sitting in front of a computer?
stories.title: Ask HN: Orthopedic Seat Pad?

stories.text: This is of course a relative question, but I'm curious about the comments.
stories.title: Ask HN: How much time should be spent on an MVP project?

stories.text:
Posted earlier about an account of mine having been suspended with no apparent reason (at least of posting rules breaking), then other two which I had in the past, for testing. As I was/am traveling at present, I used VPN in a few places, and I tested the theory of this being the source: created a new account yesterday, used it fine with no posting or submissions, then used it again today with two different VPN exit points, and sure enough: "Your account has been permanently suspended from Reddit."

If the Redit bozos do not comprehend the need for VPN, if *content* provided is of not harmful in any way, then I sure wish them good luck in keeping this service going ...
stories.title: Reddit accounts cancellation/suspension caused by VPN usage
Putin Interview After Talk with Macron

stories.text:
Anyone who tried omnisharp must have noticed how incredibly slow it is. Things which should be instant takes seconds not even mentioning all other problems it has.
Its so slow it made me curious why? Lately I have been interested in software performance and I would like to understand omnisharp architecture and decisions they made because there must be some valuable lessons there obviously it was not written to be slow but ended up to be.
For now I have very limited understanding of how it works so maybe there is somebody with better understanding of its architecture who could give me some tips or bits of knowledge.
stories.title: Ask HN: What makes omnisharp so slow?
